name: Stronger Together (APlus Studios)
description:
Blue and Purple need to get their flags to complete the game. Help them get their flags.

Player 1 -

WASD

Player 2 -

Arrow Keys

TIP: Remember the S and Down Arrow Keys...

===============================================================

All artwork is original

Sounds Courtesy of Scratch

===============================================================

This game was inspired by the 2021 Brackeys Game Jam. It took a while to animate the characters, but the code was easy since I have made many platformers before.

Enjoy!
